scripts.build:local: pnpm run version:sync && pnpm run build
scripts.format: prettier --write "src/**/*.ts" "tests/**/*.ts" "scripts/**/*.mjs" ".github/workflows/*.yml" package.json tsconfig.json tsdown.config.ts vitest.config.ts .prettierrc.json .oxlintrc.json README.md
scripts.format:check: prettier --check "src/**/*.ts" "tests/**/*.ts" "scripts/**/*.mjs" ".github/workflows/*.yml" package.json tsconfig.json tsdown.config.ts vitest.config.ts .prettierrc.json .oxlintrc.json README.md
scripts.check: pnpm run typecheck && pnpm run lint && pnpm run format:check && pnpm run test
